stretch_section.label: Stretch Section
stretch_section.description: Stretch the section to the full width of the page using JS. Learn more.
stretch_section.name: stretch_section

background_attachment_alert.raw: Note: Attachment Fixed works only on desktop.
background_attachment_alert.name: background_attachment_alert

background_video_link.label: Video Link
background_video_link.description: YouTube link or video file (mp4 is recommended).
background_video_link.name: background_video_link

background_video_fallback.label: Background Fallback
background_video_fallback.description: This cover image will replace the background video in case that the video could not be loaded.
background_video_fallback.name: background_video_fallback

background_hover_attachment_alert.raw: Note: Attachment Fixed works only on desktop.
background_hover_attachment_alert.name: background_hover_attachment_alert

background_hover_video_fallback.description: This cover image will replace the background video in case that the video could not be loaded.

background_overlay_attachment_alert.raw: Note: Attachment Fixed works only on desktop.
background_overlay_attachment_alert.name: background_overlay_attachment_alert

background_overlay_video_link.label: Video Link
background_overlay_video_link.description: YouTube link or video file (mp4 is recommended).
background_overlay_video_link.name: background_overlay_video_link

background_overlay_video_fallback.label: Background Fallback
background_overlay_video_fallback.description: This cover image will replace the background video in case that the video could not be loaded.
background_overlay_video_fallback.name: background_overlay_video_fallback

selectors.{{WRAPPER}} .elementor-background-overla: filter: brightness( {{css_filters_brightness.SIZE}}% ) contrast( {{css_filters_contrast.SIZE}}% ) saturate( {{css_filters_saturate.SIZE}}% ) blur( {{css_filters_blur.SIZE}}px ) hue-rotate( {{css_filters_hue.SIZE}}deg )

background_overlay_hover_attachment_aler.raw: Note: Attachment Fixed works only on desktop.
background_overlay_hover_attachment_aler.name: background_overlay_hover_attachment_alert

selectors.{{WRAPPER}}:hover > .elementor-backgroun: filter: brightness( {{css_filters_hover_brightness.SIZE}}% ) contrast( {{css_filters_hover_contrast.SIZE}}% ) saturate( {{css_filters_hover_saturate.SIZE}}% ) blur( {{css_filters_hover_blur.SIZE}}px ) hue-rotate( {{css_filters_hover_hue.SIZE}}deg )

colors_warning.raw: Note: The following colors won't work if Default Colors are enabled.
colors_warning.name: colors_warning

_element_id.label: CSS ID
_element_id.title: Add your custom id WITHOUT the Pound key. e.g: my-id
_element_id.name: _element_id

css_classes.label: CSS Classes
css_classes.title: Add your custom class WITHOUT the dot. e.g: my-class
css_classes.name: css_classes

responsive_description.raw: Responsive visibility will take effect only on preview or live page, and not while editing in Elementor.
responsive_description.name: responsive_description

_attributes.label: Custom Attributes
_attributes.description: Set custom attributes for the wrapper element. Each attribute in a separate line. Separate attribute key from the value using | character.
_attributes.name: _attributes

custom_css_title.raw: Add your own custom CSS here
custom_css_title.name: custom_css_title

custom_css_description.raw:
Use "selector" to target wrapper element. Examples:
selector {color: red;} // For main element
selector .child-element {margin: 10px;} // For child element
.my-class {text-align: center;} // Or use any custom selector
custom_css_description.name: custom_css_description
